Doc: Defines the expiry/observation schedule of the target.

Source.Contents:
/#
   Defines the expiry/observation schedule of the target.
 #/
record FpML5.reporting.FxAdjustedDateAndDateAdjustments {
  # Date adjustments applied to the adjusted dates including the business day convention and the business centers. The date adjustments are as specified in the definitions.
  dateAdjustments : FpML5.reporting.BusinessDayAdjustments?

  # List of schedule dates. These dates have been subject to adjustments based on the dateAdjustments structure.
  adjustedDate : date?

}

dateAdjustments.Doc: Date adjustments applied to the adjusted dates including the business day convention and the business centers. The date adjustments are as specified in the definitions.
dateAdjustments.Name: dateAdjustments

adjustedDate.Doc: List of schedule dates. These dates have been subject to adjustments based on the dateAdjustments structure.
adjustedDate.Name: adjustedDate
